sec.title: Rig data plate
sec.p: The data plate of the rig shall give at least the following information:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: the business name of the manufacturer or brand of the machine;

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: installed diesel engine power, in kW;

list-item.label: e)
list-item.p: rated voltage, frequency and installed power of the externally powered electrical installation;
